long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouAgree.org leverages the power of artificial intelligence (AI) and natural language processing (NLP) to automatically scan and analyze privacy policies and terms of use. We break down these complex documents into easy-to-understand summaries and interpretations.

Many companies use legal jargon and complex language in their privacy policies and terms of use. This "legal obscurity" can make it very difficult for consumers to understand their rights and the implications of agreeing to these terms. As a result, consumers may unknowingly consent to practices that compromise their privacy, data security, or other interests.

Browser Extension: Our browser extension seamlessly integrates with your web browsing experience. When you visit a website, the extension automatically scans the site's privacy policy and terms of use.
Plain-Language Summaries: We provide clear, concise summaries of the key points in the legal documents, highlighting potential concerns and areas of interest.
User-Friendly Interface: Our intuitive interface makes it easy for users of all levels of technical expertise to navigate and understand the information.
Advocacy and Education: We are committed to advocating for consumer rights and educating the public about online privacy and data protection.

Website Visit:When you visit a website with our browser extension installed, it automatically detects the site's privacy policy and terms of use.
Document Analysis: Our AI algorithms scan and analyze the documents, extracting key information and identifying potential concerns.
Plain-Language Summary: The extension generates a user-friendly summary of the documents, highlighting important points and potential risks.
Informed Decision-Making: Armed with this information, you can make informed decisions about whether to use the website and under what conditions.
